content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Mister Heine: Thank you for coming to view the apartment, Ryanah. Our standard rental price for a 25 square meter apartment is 800 Euros per month. Would you be interested in renting this apartment at this price?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
I understand that the apartment is 25 square meters, would you be willing to negotiate the price? [

Mister Heine: Of course, I am always willing to negotiate the rental price if it means increased profit for me. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible rental price for this apartment. Can you please provide me with some flexibility in the price? I am willing to consider any reasonable offer you have.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: I understand your concern, but I cannot lower the rental price any further at this time. The 800 Euros is the lowest I can offer. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that you cannot lower the rental price any further at this time. While 800 Euros per month is a reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment, I am looking for a lower rental price. I would like to negotiate the price further to see if we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial.
name: Ryanah Rahman
